00018         CollisionDetector::CollisionDetector(Sketch *sketch)
00019         {
00020             Group *root = sketch->getRoot();
00021             addLinesFromGroup(root);
00022 
00023             tree = new QuadTree(&objects);
00024             mathManager = MathManager::getInstance();
00025         }
00026 
00027         CollisionDetector::~CollisionDetector()
00028         {
00029             delete tree;
00030             for(vector<BoundedObject*>::iterator iterator = objects.begin();
00031                     iterator != objects.end(); iterator++) {
00032                 delete (*iterator);
00033             }
00034         }
00035 
00036         bool CollisionDetector::getClosestCollision(
00037                 const Vector2D &radius, const Vector2D &position,
00038                 const Vector2D &velocity, float *time, Vector2D *collision)
00039         {
00040             bool hasCollision = false;
00041 
00042             Vector2D ePosition = toEllipseSpace(radius, position);
00043             Vector2D eVelocity = toEllipseSpace(radius, velocity);
00044 
00045             Vector2D destination = position + velocity;
00046             BoundingBox boundingBox(
00047                     BoundingBox(position - radius,
00048                     position + radius),
00049                     BoundingBox(destination - radius,
00050                     destination + radius));
00051 
00052             /* The result from the tree search. */
00053             /* TODO When there are multiple calls in one frame, it will
00054              * calculate the result every time. We don't want that. */
00055             vector<BoundedObject*> result;
00056             tree->findObjects(&boundingBox, &result);
00057 
00058             /* Loop over all lines to find closest collision. */
00059             for(vector<BoundedObject*>::iterator iterator = result.begin();
00060                     iterator != result.end(); iterator++) {
00061 
00062                 /* Get the line segment. */
00063                 LineSegment *segment = (LineSegment*) *iterator;
00064 
00065                 /* Convert the segment to ellipse space. */
00066                 LineSegment *eSegment = new LineSegment(
00067                         toEllipseSpace(radius, segment->getStart()),
00068                         toEllipseSpace(radius, segment->getEnd()));
00069 
00070                 /* Temporary result variables. */
00071                 Vector2D tmpCollision;
00072                 float tmpTime;
00073 
00074                 /* Check against single segment. */
00075                 if(getClosestCollision(eSegment, ePosition, eVelocity,
00076                         &tmpTime, &tmpCollision)) {
00077                     /* If this collision is the closest, store it, erasing
00078                      * the previously remembered collision. */
00079                     if(!hasCollision || tmpTime < *time) {
00080                         hasCollision = true;
00081                         *collision = fromEllipseSpace(radius, tmpCollision);
00082                         *time = tmpTime;
00083                     }
00084                 }
00085 
00086                 /* Delete the ellipse space segment. */
00087                 delete eSegment;
00088             }
00089 
00090             return hasCollision;
00091         }
00092 
00093         void CollisionDetector::addLinesFromGroup(Group *group)
00094         {
00095             for(int i = 0; i < group->getNumberOfSketchElements(); i++) {
00096                 SketchElement *element = group->getSketchElement(i);
00097                 if(element->getType() == SKETCHELEMENTTYPE_GROUP)
00098                     addLinesFromGroup((Group*) element);
00099                 else if(element->getType() == SKETCHELEMENTTYPE_PATH)
00100                     addLinesFromPath((Path*) element);
00101             }
00102         }
00103 
00104         void CollisionDetector::addLinesFromPath(Path *path)
00105         {
00106             for(int i = 0; i < path->getNumberOfComponents(); i++) {
00107                 PathComponent *component = path->getComponent(i);
00108                 for(int j = 0; j < component->getNumberOfSegments(); j++) {
00109                     PathSegment *segment = component->getSegment(j);
00110                     float increment = Path::getSubdivideLength() /
00111                             segment->getLength();
00112                     Vector2D previous = segment->getPoint(0.0f), current;
00113                     for(float t = increment; t <= 1.0f; t += increment) {
00114                         current = segment->getPoint(t);
00115                         objects.push_back(new LineSegment(current, previous));
00116                         previous = current; 
00117                     }
00118                         
00119 
00120                     // Last segment for sure. 
00121                     objects.push_back(new LineSegment(previous, 
00122                                 segment->getPoint(1.0f)));
00123                 }
00124             }
00125         }
00126 
00127         bool CollisionDetector::getClosestCollision(LineSegment *segment,
00128                 const Vector2D &position, const Vector2D &velocity,
00129                 float *time, Vector2D *collision) const
00130         {
00131             Line line = segment->getLine();
00132             float signedDistanceToLine = line.getSignedDistance(position);
00133             float normalDotVelocity = line.getNormal() * velocity;
00134 
00135             /* Collision times. */
00136             float t0, t1;
00137             bool embeddedInLine = false;
00138             
00139             /* Special case: normalDotVelocity == 0.0f */
00140             if(normalDotVelocity == 0.0f) {
00141                 /* Collision. */
00142                 if(line.getDistance(position) < 1.0f) {
00143                     t0 = 0.0f;
00144                     t1 = 1.0f;
00145                     embeddedInLine = true;
00146                 } else {
00147                     return false;
00148                 }
00149             } else {
00150                 /* Calculate times. */
00151                 t0 = (1.0f - signedDistanceToLine) / normalDotVelocity;
00152                 t1 = (-1.0f - signedDistanceToLine) / normalDotVelocity;
00153 
00154                 /* Sort. */
00155                 if(t0 > t1) {
00156                     float tmp = t0;
00157                     t0 = t1;
00158                     t1 = tmp;
00159                 }
00160 
00161                 /* Check that at least one result is within range. */
00162                 if(t0 > 1.0f || t1 < 0.0f)
00163                     return false;
00164 
00165                 /* Clamp to [0, 1] */
00166                 t0 = mathManager->clamp(t0, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00167                 t1 = mathManager->clamp(t1, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00168             }
00169 
00170             /* Will contain the solution of the equation. */
00171             bool foundCollision = false;
00172             *time = 1.0f;
00173             float root;
00174 
00175             /* Check start. */
00176             if(pointCollision(position, velocity, segment->getStart(), *time,
00177                     &root, collision)) {
00178                 foundCollision = true;
00179                 *time = root;
00180             }
00181 
00182             /* Check end. */
00183             if(pointCollision(position, velocity, segment->getEnd(), *time,
00184                     &root, collision)) {
00185                 foundCollision = true;
00186                 *time = root;
00187             }
00188 
00189             /* Check line segment between start and end. */
00190             BoundingBox *segmentBox = segment->getBoundingBox();
00191             Vector2D collisionPoint =
00192                     line.getClosestPoint(position + velocity * t0);
00193             if(segmentBox->hasPoint(collisionPoint) && t0 <= *time
00194                     && t0 >= 0.0f) {
00195                 *time = t0;
00196                 foundCollision = true;
00197                 *collision = collisionPoint;
00198             } else {
00199                 collisionPoint =
00200                         line.getClosestPoint(position + velocity * t1);
00201                 if(segmentBox->hasPoint(collisionPoint) && t1 <= *time
00202                     && t1 >= 0.0f) {
00203                     *time = t1;
00204                     foundCollision = true;
00205                     *collision = collisionPoint;
00206                 }
00207             }
00208 
00209             return foundCollision;
00210         }
00211 
00212         bool CollisionDetector::pointCollision(
00213                 const Vector2D &position, const Vector2D &velocity,
00214                 const Vector2D &point, float treshold, float *time,
00215                 Vector2D *collision) const
00216         {
00217             float root;
00218             if(mathManager->getLowestPositiveRoot(velocity.getSquaredLength(),
00219                     2.0f * (velocity * (position - point)),
00220                     (point - position).getSquaredLength() - 1.0f, treshold,
00221                     &root)) {
00222                 *time = root;
00223                 *collision = point;
00224                 return true;
00225             } else {
00226                 return false;
00227             }
00228         }
00229 
00230         Vector2D CollisionDetector::toEllipseSpace(const Vector2D &radius,
00231                 const Vector2D &v) const
00232         {
00233             return Vector2D(v.getX() / radius.getX(), v.getY() / radius.getY());
00234         }
00235 
00236         Vector2D CollisionDetector::fromEllipseSpace(const Vector2D &radius,
00237                 const Vector2D &v) const
00238         {
00239             return Vector2D(v.getX() * radius.getX(), v.getY() * radius.getY());
00240         }
00241     }
00242 }
